Body.Content:
New Microsoft Syntex features (listed below) will be available as a preview for a limited time for customers who have an Azure subscription connected to Microsoft Syntex billing and are using one or more pay-as-you-go Syntex capabilities.

The features below will not be charged on a pay-as-you-go basis in the preview.

The feature list includes:

  • Content query
  • Universal annotation
  • Contracts accelerator
  • Accounts payable accelerator
  • Taxonomy features (including import using SKOS, SKOS formatting reference, push content type to hub, and term store reports)
  • PDF merge/extract pages
  • Content processing rules: move or copy a file, set a content type from file name.

Learn more about these features here: Licensing for Microsoft Syntex: Feature Limited Preview.

To review all conditions that apply please refer to this document: Microsoft Syntex features limited time license.

When this will happen:

The features will be available by late October 2023. 

How this will affect your organization:

These features will be available to customers who have an Azure subscription connected to Microsoft Syntex billing and are using one or more pay-as-you-go Syntex capabilities.

What you need to do to prepare:

Please refer to this document to review how to enable Pay as you go for Syntex in your tenant: Configure Microsoft Syntex for pay-as-you-go billing.

Title: Microsoft Syntex features limited time license
